$PLTR what I haven’t seen anybody mention is that Cathie now has an inverse ETF on her funds and it will have a prospectus that is designed to short whatever she is long …. This can be a blessing and a curse …. They will be able to downtick short to oblivion, and conversely can get its shareholders heads cut off on anything that out generate a gamma squeeze on $PLTR … whoever started the fund when all her stock were 50-70% higher was a genius, but also now at these levels is an idiot because they are many reason the stock could spike …to name a few ; buyout risk, massive contract risk, exclusive contract risk with a major like $MSFT or $AMZN … or even $NVDA
